mapper.sql: id, device_id, company_id, asset_sn, purchase_date, supply_company_id, purchase_price, monetary_unit, flag_deleted, flag_assign, create_time, create_person, update_time, update_person
mapper.insert:
insert into dmi_device_company_relation
id,
device_id,
company_id,
asset_sn,
purchase_date,
supply_company_id,
purchase_price,
monetary_unit,
flag_deleted,
flag_assign,
create_time,
create_person,
update_time,
update_person,
memo,

mapper.update:
update dmi_device_company_relation
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_sn = #{assetSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_date = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
supply_company_id = #{supplyCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
monetary_unit = #{monetaryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_assign = #{flagAssign,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select device.device_name AS deviceName, brand.brand_name AS brand, model.model_name AS model, device.device_sn AS deviceSn, device.create_time AS createTime, typeCatalog.catalog_name AS catalogName, device.id as id from bif_device device LEFT JOIN bif_device_model model ON model.id = device.model_id LEFT JOIN bif_device_series series ON series.id = model.series_id LEFT JOIN bif_device_brand brand ON brand.id = series.brand_id LEFT JOIN cfg_device_type_catalog typeCatalog ON device.catalog_id = typeCatalog.id where device.flag_deleted = 0 AND device.id not in (select device_id from dmi_device_company_relation where flag_deleted = 0)

select device.device_name AS deviceName, brand.brand_name AS brand, model.model_name AS model, device.device_sn AS deviceSn, device.create_time AS createTime, typeCatalog.catalog_name AS catalogName, device.id as id from bif_device device LEFT JOIN cfg_device_type_catalog typeCatalog ON device.catalog_id = typeCatalog.id INNER JOIN bif_device_model model ON model.id = device.model_id
AND model.id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND model.flag_deleted = 0
INNER JOIN bif_device_series series ON series.id = model.series_id
AND series.id = #{seriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND series.flag_deleted = 0
INNER JOIN bif_device_brand brand ON brand.id = series.brand_id
AND brand.id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND brand.flag_deleted = 0
where device.flag_deleted = 0 AND device.id not in (select device_id from dmi_device_company_relation where flag_deleted = 0)
and device.catalog_id in
#{parentId}
and device.device_sn = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT device.device_name AS deviceName, brand.brand_name AS brand, model.model_name AS model, device.device_sn AS deviceSn, deviceCompanyRelation.asset_sn AS assetSn, deviceCompanyRelation.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, typeCatalog.catalog_name AS catalogName, deviceCompanyRelation.id AS deviceCompanyRelationId, device.id AS id FROM bif_device device LEFT JOIN bif_device_model model ON model.id = device.model_id LEFT JOIN bif_device_series series ON series.id = model.series_id LEFT JOIN bif_device_brand brand ON brand.id = series.brand_id INNER JOIN dmi_device_company_relation deviceCompanyRelation ON device.id = deviceCompanyRelation.device_id AND deviceCompanyRelation.flag_deleted = 0 AND deviceCompanyRelation.flag_deleted = 0 AND deviceCompanyRelation.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} LEFT JOIN cfg_device_type_catalog typeCatalog ON device.catalog_id = typeCatalog.id WHERE device.flag_deleted = 0

select
,
from dmi_device_company_relation where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND flag_deleted = 0
